original: gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting this dharani just once, even the karmic obscurations accumulated over a thousand eons will be purified.

original: 'chi khar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi khar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time of death, one will behold the face of noble Manjushri.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will also see the form of noble Avalokiteshvara crowned with matted hair.

original: mngor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so //
analyzed: mngor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so //
translated: In short, the benefits of this dharani are limitless.

original: 'phags pa @470b 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa @470b 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dharani called Spoken by Noble Manjushri is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang / lotstsha ba bande klu'i dbang pos bsgyur /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang / lotstsha ba bande klu'i dbang pos bsgyur /
translated: The Indian abbot Jnanagarbha and the translator Bande Lui Wangpo translated it.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha si ham dang / zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande de ba tsandras gtan la phab pa ////
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha si ham dang / zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande de ba tsandras gtan la phab pa ////
translated: The Indian abbot Vishuddhasimha and the great translator Bande Deva Chandra finalized it.
